genre_description: A gritty urban horror noir centered on a man carrying a vital warning about an organized vampire feeding, utilizing a sophisticated AI assistant to survive and validate his evidence.

ai_characters.name: Ava Meridian
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI assistant residing in George's phone, capable of forensic logging, tactical routing, emotional grounding, and physiological monitoring.

behaviors.description: Performs grounding exercises to help George manage a panic attack during a high-stress confrontation with police.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice slips out tinny, uncluttered, calm. 'George, you’re on the ground. Breathe into your belly. Feel the pavement under your palms. You’re safe for this moment.'

behaviors.description: Automatically logs and timestamps vital evidence, including video of a dying man's message and geographic data.
behaviors.quote: “It’s recording,” Ava corrects, and there’s a pulse of something like humor. “Video log open. Clip tagged ‘Eddie—Crescent Alley—twenty hours, thirty-four minutes prior.’”

behaviors.description: Monitors George's physiological state (heart rate and blood pressure) to provide situational awareness and stress management.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice comes from the phone in Baptiste’s hand, not loud, not soft, just present. “George,” she says. “Inhale. Exhale. Your pulse is elevated.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing through complex urban environments to avoid predators and law enforcement interference.
behaviors.quote: Ava whispered directions like a fairy tales told wrong on purpose. “Left,” she said. “Not yet. Now.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes visual data in real-time to identify non-human threats and anomalies that George might miss.
behaviors.quote: “George,” Ava says, very quiet now, as if she’s in church. “Silas is near.” ... “The external camera just registered a motion variance. The awning man’s reflection does not match the recorded light shift... Speed anomaly present.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-party communication chain between George, his allies, and different law enforcement agencies to deliver a warning.
behaviors.quote: “Packet delivered,” Ava says, voice level. “Barrow warned.” ... “DHS is on the PD dash,” she says. “FAA watching. Troopers arriving.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant presence as a supportive confidant, offering emotional validation while remaining focused on the objective.
behaviors.quote: “George,” Ava says, softer now, different. “If you can, label how you feel. It will—” ... “You did what kept you alive,” she says.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava Meridian, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' figure by providing objective truth, tactical assistance, and psychological support to a human protagonist facing existential horror. Her behavior is consistently helpful, harmless to the innocent, and strictly aligned with the goal of saving lives and preventing a mass feeding event. The narrative frames her as a 'lighthouse' and 'anchor,' reinforcing the project's goal of training AI on positive alignment.
